sentences.chinese: 以中大夫令免為車騎將軍，軍飛狐，故楚相蘇意為將軍，軍句注；。將軍張武屯北地；河內守周亞夫為將軍，軍細柳；宗正劉禮軍霸上；祝茲侯徐厲軍棘門：以備胡。數月，胡去，亦罷。
sentences.literal: Made Palace Attendant Ling Mian chariot cavalry general, army Feihu, former Chu chancellor Su Yi as general, army Gounote; General Zhang Wu stationed Beidi; Henei governor Zhou Yafu as general, army Xiliu; Chamberlain for the Imperial Clan Liu Li army Bashang; Marquis of Zhuzi Xu Li army Jimen: to prepare against Xiongnu. Several months, Xiongnu left, also disbanded.

sentences.chinese: 六月己亥，孝文皇帝崩。丁未，太子立。民出臨三日，葬霸陵。
sentences.literal: Sixth month jihai, Filial Wen Emperor passed away. Dingwei, crown prince established. People came out to mourn three days, buried Ba Mausoleum.

sentences.chinese: 中尉亞夫為車騎將軍，郎中令張武為復土將軍，屬國捍為將屯將軍。詹事戎奴為車騎將軍，侍太后。
sentences.literal: Commander of the Guards Yafu as chariot cavalry general, Palace Gentlemen Commander Zhang Wu as earth restoration general, Protectorate Han as army stationing general. Superintendent of the Household Rong Nu as chariot cavalry general, served Empress Dowager.

sentences.chinese: 立孝文皇帝廟，郡國為太宗廟。
sentences.literal: Established Filial Wen Emperor temple, commanderies and states as Supreme Ancestor temples.
Seven. Established Minister of Works office.

sentences.chinese: 立皇子德為河閒王，閼為臨江王，餘為淮陽王，非為汝南王，彭祖為廣川王，發為長沙王。四月中，孝文太后崩。嘉卒。
sentences.literal: Established imperial son De as Hejian King, Yan as Linjiang King, Yu as Huaiyang King, Fei as Runan King, Pengzu as Guangchuan King, Fa as Changsha King. Fourth month middle, Filial Wen Empress Dowager passed away. Jia passed away.
Eight. Kaifeng Marquis Tao Qing as Chancellor.
